00357 class BRISA_UPNP_EXPORT BrisaServiceFetcher: public QObject {
00358 Q_OBJECT
00359 
00360 public:
00368     BrisaServiceFetcher(BrisaControlPointService *service, QString location,
00369             QObject *parent = 0) :
00370         QObject(parent), location(location), service(service) {
00371         eventLoop = new QEventLoop();
00372         downloader = new QNetworkAccessManager();
00373 
00374         connect(this, SIGNAL(fetchFinished()), eventLoop, SLOT(quit()));
00375         connect(downloader, SIGNAL(finished(QNetworkReply*)), this,
00376                 SLOT(downloadFinished(QNetworkReply*)));
00377         service = NULL;
00378         error = false;
00379     }
00380 
00386     ~BrisaServiceFetcher() {
00387         delete downloader;
00388         delete eventLoop;
00389     }
00390 
00397     bool fetch(void) {
00398         downloader->get(QNetworkRequest(location));
00399         eventLoop->exec();
00400 
00401         return error;
00402     }
00403 
00404 private:
00410     QEventLoop *eventLoop;
00411 
00417     QNetworkAccessManager *downloader;
00418 
00424     QString location;
00425 
00431     BrisaControlPointService *service;
00432 
00438     bool error;
00439 
00440 signals:
00446     void fetchFinished(void);
00447 
00448 private slots:
00457     void downloadFinished(QNetworkReply *reply) {
00458         QTemporaryFile *scpd = new QTemporaryFile();
00459 
00460         if (!scpd->open()) {
00461             qDebug() << "Failed to open scpd file for writing";
00462             error = true;
00463             emit
00464             fetchFinished();
00465             return;
00466         }
00467 
00468         scpd->write(reply->readAll());
00469         scpd->seek(0);
00470         service->parseFromXml(scpd);
00471 
00472         scpd->remove();
00473         delete scpd;
00474         emit fetchFinished();
00475     }
00476 
00477 };
00478 
00479 }
